external_references.source_name: Google Mandiant Storm-0501 Sabbath Ransomware November 2021
external_references.description: Tyler McLellan, Brandan Schondorfer. (2021, November 29). Kitten.gif: Meet the Sabbath Ransomware Affiliate Program, Again. Retrieved October 19, 2025.

objects.description: [Storm-0501](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1053) has utilized their own self-signed TLS certificate “Microsoft IT TLS CA 5” with their infrastructure.(Citation: Google Mandiant Storm-0501 Sabbath Ransomware November 2021)
